abstract: The arrest of the brothers bodes ill for BP’s work here and is likely to send chills through the ranks of Russian employees at Western companies.
snippet: The arrest of the brothers bodes ill for BP’s work here and is likely to send chills through the ranks of Russian employees at Western companies.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  Russian security services have detained an employee of BP’s Russian joint venture and are accusing that man and his brother of industrial espionage, according to a statement released Thursday.

headline.main: Russia Arrests 2 Tied to BP Joint Venture
headline.print_headline: Russia Arrests 2 Tied to BP Joint Venture, Accusing Them of Industrial Espionage
